items.title: Investors Can’t Wait for the Fed’s Imminent Rate Cut
items.description: Stocks hit a record high after cooler-than-expected inflation data.

items.title: Why the Best Leaders Embrace Both ‘Agile’ and ‘Waterfall’ Thinking
items.description: Some leaders plan, others pivot. The best do some of each.

items.title: In Its Second Major Pivot, Revel Bets Big on EV Charging
items.description: Sometimes, you have to pivot. In Revel’s case, it’s doing so twice.

items.title: 3 Reasons Your Employees Are Burning Out—and How to Fix It
items.description: Burnout is one of the main reasons your top performers are quietly checking out. Here’s what you can do before they walk out the door.

items.title: Perplexity’s $34.5 Billion Dream of Buying Chrome Is Never Going to Happen. It’s Also Kind of Brilliant
items.description: If Google has to sell Chrome, Perplexity wants to be first in line.
